name: myGame
description: An interactive app with both a front and a backend that allows users to post stats as a collective group of friends

name: You + Me
description: Food recipe generator that uses fetch API calls to generate random recipes

name: Tech Blog
description: Full stack application blog that lets a user post data and comments

name: Work Day Scheduler
